questions.question: how to be more productive
questions.answer:
If you want to improve your productivity, you can learn about time management and the Pomodoro Technique. Check out this link for more information: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#COURSECONTENTCOLLAPSE5
What specific aspect of productivity are you looking to enhance?

questions.question: I want to be more productive on writing
questions.answer:
To enhance your productivity in writing, you can explore techniques such as setting specific writing goals and creating a conducive writing environment. For more detailed strategies, you can refer to this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#COURSECONTENTCOLLAPSE5
What type of writing projects are you currently working on?
